name: Project 22 (Ryank12)
description:
IMPORTANT: The dreaded flying eyeballs managed to hack into the system. Use CTRL + ALT + F4 to close the game. 

Controls: 

Move Left: A Or Left Arrow

Move Right: D or Right Arrow

Jump: Up arrow or Space

Shoot: X or K

Timestop: C or L

Programmer: Ryan, Gary

Artist: Thiccbiscuits

Musician: Dilara

Sound: Alex

Pixel Bullet from: https://blackdragon1727.itch.io/fire-pixel-bullet-16x16

Ground assets: https://anokolisa.itch.io/montain-forest-asset-pack

The Dreaded Flying Eye Ball: https://luizmelo.itch.io/monsters-creatures-fantasy

Special thanks to Sukiyomi and Gitrogatog
